extendedInfo.description: A Quran dictionary, grammar and concordance resource all in one. For each root it lists meanings from Classical Arabic dictionaries, for words in Quran it shows every occurrence and its grammar information, allowing deeper study and cross-reference. Links to Lane's Lexicon online for further reading. Very helpful in studying The Quran.

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: It would be great if actual Arabic characters are included like you have on the web. A key to the Arabic character  to English transliteration would be nice. Also roots starting with Siin seem to be missing. Please, an option to turn off the audio. It sounds really weird.
reviews.author: Hilmy Hashim
